title: Is Far Cry 6 a Prequel?  - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.10.20
description:

Blessing and Greg wrap up the week by talking about the reveal of the next Far Cry game.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping
We’re reacting to Ubisoft Forward on Sunday at noon pt.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:55 -  Far Cry 6 is official - Alex Avard @ Games Radar
00:13:22 - With the news about Far Cry 6 being leaked I have to ask, do you folks actually care about Far Cry at this point? - Best Friends Q:Scott
00:26:30 - Sony has invested 250 Million Dollars Epic - Rebekah Valentine @ GiBiz
00:33:00 - Deals like this don't happen overnight. The fact that Epic and Sony were in talks over $250 million dollars at a time that Epic was hyping the PS5 without disclosing the potential financial deal seems sketchy to me. Do you agree or am I reading too much into this? Do you think this is a good investment for Sony? What is in it for them beyond the obvious profits off the investment? - Best Friends Q:Grezick
00:38:42 - Xbox Series X Games Aren't Being Held Back By Xbox One according to Phil Spencer - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:46:02 - Ghostbuster World closing!
